availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Clark (Henry County, Kentucky, wagonmaker.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, wagonmaker. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Gibson Clark in Shelby County, Kentucky, on April 24, 1842. Father of Mary Jane Clark, James W Clark, and Ann Eliza Clark. Wagonmaker in Henry County in 1850. Wagonmaker in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 2., p. 453B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 353.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle Precinct, p. 343B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henry County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000259288.
"John S. Clarke (1816-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial 28113307, accessed December 7, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28113307.
